name: Default Quantity for WooCommerce
author: Mohiuddin Abdul Kader

sections.description:
DEFAULT QUANTITY FOR WOOCOMMERCE

The WooCommerce Default Quantity plugin simplifies the task of adjusting initial quantity values in your online store. Whether you want to modify the quantity for certain products, categories, or your entire inventory, this plugin has got you covered. With its straightforward functionality, you can easily set default quantity values to meet your specific requirements. Whether you need a single product to start with a higher quantity or want to establish a standard value for an entire category, the WooCommerce Default Quantity plugin ensures seamless customization. Its efficiency and precision make it an invaluable tool for managing and streamlining your online store’s inventory.

POWERED BY WooCommerce

With its simple yet powerful default quantity options, the plugin allows you to easily change the initial quantity and subtly influence customers to make larger purchases. This effective feature promotes increased sales by encouraging customers to buy more items from your online store.

üõçÔ∏è Supercharge Your business with the Default Quantity for WooCommerce.

3 WAYS TO SET DEFAULT QUANTITIES

‚öñÔ∏è Set a global, storewide WooCommerce default quantity.

‚öñÔ∏è Add default quantities for entire product categories.

‚öñÔ∏è Change the default quantity for specific products.

CHOOSE ANY DEFAULT QUANTITY – EVEN ZERO!

üéâ Change the WooCommerce default quantity to zero and give customers complete freedom.

üéâ Set the initial quantity value to any number and motivate customers to buy larger quantities.

üéâ The customer can override the default quantity and select any quantity they choose.

QUICK 2-MINUTE SETUP

üî• Incredibly simple to use.

üî• Ideal for beginners or developers.

üî• Simply install the plugin, and start setting default quantities!

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

  1. Upload the plugin zip file to your plugin directory ‚Äò/wp-content/plugins/‚Äô
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‚ÄòPlugins‚Äô menu in WordPress
  3. Go to product details and click on WooCommerce->Products->Inventory menu
  4. Set global default quantity
  5. Save/update the settings page
